name: Proceeding Disputation
description:
Proceeding Disputation is an extremely oversimplified, satirical take on the US congress's system of sifting through bills.  Think of it as Tinder for silly government documents.

LEFT  ARROW and RIGHT ARROW to REJECT and ACCEPT

all other instructions are in-game

     

MUSIC: 

COLOR PALETTE: https://lospec.com/palette-list/americana
